NEW STORY STARTS NOW!
The Hulk finds himself caught between the Enchantress and the Mighty Thor!
When the monster in the trunk breaks loose, the Ten Realms may never be the same!
Don't miss the shocking reveal of a side of Amadeus you've never seen before!
